name: Geppo Survive
description:
Help Geppo Survive 100 Days! Run away from snakes and wolves, eat fruits and hunt the rabbits, craft your barricate, drink water, in night if you are lucky you can find the pixie, sleep and survive ...

System Requirements:

64 bit CPU
DX11 GPU
4 gb ram

In Linux you need to install the following dependencies:

libcurl4 
libopenal1
libopenal-dev
